title: Challenge 8: Potentiometer
description: Read the value from a potentiometer.
codeSolution:
import machine
import time

adc = machine.ADC(0)

while True:
    pot_value = adc.read()
    print('Potentiometer value:', pot_value)
    time.sleep(1)
